Hi team, I want to discuss the Product Requirements Document for SalesforceTrendAnalyzer. Let's brainstorm some ideas and outline the key sections we need to include. ğŸ˜Š
Hey @eid_9937f1d5, sounds good! I think we should start with defining the core functionalities. We need to clearly outline how the tool will identify trends across organizational data.
Agreed, @eid_52681a26. We should also consider integration points with existing Salesforce features. This will be crucial for seamless user experience.
From a QA perspective, we need to ensure we have a section on testing strategies. Identifying potential edge cases early will be key. ğŸ› ï¸
Yes, @eid_97b4acd0! And maybe a section on performance metrics? We should define what success looks like for this product.
I can help with drafting the testing strategies section. Let's make sure we cover both functional and non-functional requirements.
I'll assist @eid_374a009b with that. We should also include user acceptance criteria to ensure the product meets user needs.
For the UX part, I'll focus on user personas and journey mapping. We need to understand how different roles within an organization will interact with SalesforceTrendAnalyzer.
